description:
With one month left till the prefectural tournament, Minato directs the others on how they should train while starting a regimen of his own to work on getting his groove back. He and the team have a lot on their minds as the days dwindle down.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: It`s the Only Way I Know to Win
Ore wa Kono Kachi Kata Shika Shiranai
俺はこの勝ち方しか知らない
